Description.Text: Facilities Guest accommodation comprises 302 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area, a bar, room service, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms A range of amenities complete the standard fittings of the accommodation units. All rooms feature a mini fridge and WiFi. The establishment offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to guests. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
